mapper.select: select cate.id as id,cate.category_name as cateName, cate.`status`,cate.uid,tag.id as tagId,tag.tag_name tagName, tag.cate_id cateId from grow_category cate left join grow_tag tag on cate.id = tag.cate_id and cate.uid = tag.uid where cate.uid = #{uid} and tag.status = 0 and cate.status != 2
mapper.insert:
insert into grow_category (category_name,uid,`status`,create_time,update_time) SELECT #{categoryName},#{uid},#{status},now(),#{updateTime} from dual where not exists (select * from grow_category where uid = #{uid} and category_name = #{categoryName})
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
mapper.update: update grow_category set status = #{status} , update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update grow_category set status = 2 , update_time = now() where id = #{id}
